detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract PointwishToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#62-81) has payable functions:
	 - PointwishToken.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#75-77)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0

detectors.description:
ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#34-40) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to] + _amount > balances[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#35)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#36)
	- balances[_to] += _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#37)

detectors.description:
ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#42-49) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balances[_from] >= _amount && allowed[_from][msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to] + _amount > balances[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#43)
	- balances[_from] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#44)
	- allowed[_from][msg.sender] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#45)
	- balances[_to] += _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#46)
